scenario_text.value:
The heck’re you guys doing?! Rip that guy to
shreds, already!

Calm down, Kaito! If we don’t keep our cool,
we’ll lose the battles we can actually win!

Don’t you dare act all levelheaded! I bet you
don’t even give a damn about all this!

I’ll avenge Miu...by sending all the bastards
that took her away straight to hell!

(What? More enemies?! We’re gonna have to
regroup...)
